CHAT.comment: HUGH M. CAPERTON, ET AL. Petitioners v. A.T. MASSEY COAL COMPANY, INC., ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:15 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ANDREW L. FREY ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:18 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
